Welcome to Liradesigns

Print | Digital | Product Design

Liradesigns is a New Delhi based multimedia design and content development company that specialises in brand building across traditional print, current digital and emerging cloud platforms

 

We handle everything to establish your brand identity

from traditional Print design and packaging to the digital Cloud


Choose from a wide range of design services from start-up brand name and logo identity, brochures, product packaging, websites, social media, infographics, shoots or films in HD or 4K, we provide a design environment to help you maintain a razor sharp focus on running your business.

From a strategic perspective, design based thinking affords you the ability to be both agile and competitive at the same time.

Call or WhatsApp us on 8383027254 or email me at lilly@liradesigns.com

After completing a Bachelors in Commerce, I studied software systems management for a bit, and then went on to study Commercial Arts, Oil Painting, Computer Graphics Design & Creative Writing which led me to work as an Accounts Manager in advertising, as a Multimedia Visualiser and as a Computer Graphics Artist for television.
Some of my other interests include Glass Painting, Paper Quilling, Reiki Healing, Kathak & Jazz Dance and I have also conducted art classes at AADI Action for Ability Development and Inclusion (NGO) & Promoting Crafts made by the differently-abled
- Lilly Mohanty, Art Director
